heading: How many young people are out of work, education or training?
subheading: In 2024, 2.8% of EU citizens aged 15-29 were NEETs ('Not in Education, Employment or Training'), which is a stable figure compared to the past decade.
textNote: The transition from education to work has become more complex and less clear, leaving many young people lost in transition.Figures for Ireland, Latvia, Luxembourg, Poland, Portugal and Slovakia are from 2022.
